title: Cat License
info: The Cat License is a consumable item purchased from the Zoologist for 5. Using it allows a cat to move into town. Upon use, a message is displayed that reads "The license teleports away to the cat delivery service..." The Town Cat will move into town the next day at 4:30 AM if there is a home for it to move in to. It can only be used once per world and the Zoologist will not sell more than one in a world.
stat:
Use time45 (Very slow)
TooltipUse to let a cat arrive in town
